cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1934, Promoting United States International Leadership in 5G Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 49 (Tuesday, March 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McCAUL:
H.R. 1934.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States
[Page H1414]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Promoting United States International Leadership in 5G Act of 2021
